PRIVACY:
Privacy Policy

Effective date: July 8, 2024

This Privacy Policy describes how Jheison Alexander Alzate ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and protects the information of users ("you" or "your") of the ChessColate application ("the application").

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Authentication Information

When you authenticate in our application using your Google account, we collect your email address and other basic profile information provided by Google.

1.2 Usage Information

We collect data about the exercises you perform in the application, including your progress and ELO scores, to keep track of your performance in the game of chess.

2. Use of Information

We use the collected information to:

  • Authenticate users and allow access to the application.
  • Maintain a record of your progress and ELO scores in chess exercises.
  • Improve the user experience and application functionalities.

3. Sharing of Information

We do not share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:

  • With your consent: We may share your information with third parties if you give us your consent to do so.
  • Compliance with the law: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to a valid request by public authorities.

4. Information Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use Firebase for data storage, which complies with industry security standards.

5. Information Retention

We retain your personal information as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with our services. If you wish to delete your account or request that we no longer use your information, you can contact us at developer.alzate@gmail.com.

6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access the information we have about you.
  • Request the correction of any incorrect information.
  • Request the deletion of your personal information.

7. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you about any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

8. Contact

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at:

Jheison Alexander Alzate
developer.alzate@gmail.com
